_header: Jesu that art gentle for joy of Thy Dame
_description: Ballad of a tyrannical husband — twenty-eight monorhyming quatrains (imperfect at end)

Chetham8009.First Lines:
Ihesu that arte Jentyll ffore Joye off thy damAs thu wrought thys
                    wyde worlde in hevyn is þi hom……
Chetham8009.Last Lines:
…They wer bese alday A fytte here I fyndeAnd I had drenke eny
                    Ye shall heyre the best be hynd…
Chetham8009.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.196-9.
